item.title: NATURES SUNSHINE PRODUCTS INC 10-K
item.description: NATURES SUNSHINE PRODUCTS INC, which is in the Pharmaceutical Preparations [2834] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 08, 2022 had 23531 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2021 - 279 instances 31 - 265 instances december - 244 instances financial - 228 instances products - 200 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
